subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Breeding of Animals
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo faces charges of animal cruelty over allegations of neglect of his horses, who are now being nursed back to health.
snippet: The thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo faces charges of animal cruelty over allegations of neglect of his horses, who are now being nursed back to health.
